nodes.text: The Stokhli were a people native to the Inner Rim world of Manress. In ancient times, they designed the spraynet launching weapon known as the spray stick in order to hunt their homeworld's megafauna.

In the new Star Wars canon the Stokhli were first mentioned in the 2019 Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying supplement Gadgets and Gear. They originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they were first mentioned in the 1991 novel Heir to the Empire, which was written by Timothy Zahn.
